name: @nicorodri/tempo-tracker-monorepo
description: CLI tool for tracking time spent on git branches and syncing with Tempo

scripts.build: bun run build:core && bun run build:backend && bun run build:daemon && bun run build:cli
scripts.build:all: bun run build:core && bun run build:backend && bun run build:daemon && bun run build:cli
scripts.publish-all: bun run publish:core && bun run publish:backend && bun run publish:daemon && bun run publish:cli
scripts.publish-beta: bun run publish:core:beta && bun run publish:backend:beta && bun run publish:daemon:beta && bun run publish:cli:beta
scripts.publish:core:beta: cd packages/core && bun publish --tag beta --access public --verbose
scripts.publish:backend:beta: cd apps/backend && bun publish --tag beta --access public --verbose
scripts.publish:daemon:beta: cd apps/daemon && bun publish --tag beta --access public --verbose
scripts.publish:cli:beta: cd apps/cli && bun publish --tag beta --access public --verbose

author: NRodriguezcuellar
